titles.title: A resolution to require accessibility to the blind of the Congressional Record printed in braille.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 2/19/1987--Introduced. Amends rule IV of the Standing Rules of the Senate to require Senate proceedings to be briefly and accurately stated on the Journal and that a single copy of the Journal be made available through the Secretary of the Senate for the use of blind citizens.
